greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Signed repeated natural numbers.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,-2,0,-1)
formula: a(n) = floor(n/2)*(-1)^floor(n/2) = A004526(n)*(-1)^A004526(n). - _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Dec 10 2013
maple: A127365:=n->floor(n/2)*(-1)^floor(n/2); seq(A127365(n), n=0..100); # _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Nov 30 2013
program: (MAGMA) [(n div 2)*(-1)^(n div 2): n in [0..100]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 18 2018
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Jan 11 2007
